1.name: Mick
1.text: (Don't you dare use [color]Telepathy[/color] on me by pressing [color][ui_select][/color] and selecting it within the [color]PSI menu[/color].

2.name: Mick
2.text: And don't even think of using it by simply holding down [color][ui_toggle][/color] and pressing [color][ui_accept][/color].)
